*This does not include the first two grants from the Rockefeller Foundation
to the NAEB through the University of Illinois. These grants, in the amount
of #6,380.00 and #7,700.00 respectively, made possible what education and
educational broadcasters now refer to as the First and Second Allerton Semi¬
nars, held in 1949 and 1950, respectively.
